Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd Street/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Kedzie, 99th, Western, and 103rd due to, street blockage at 103rd Street/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Kedzie, 99th, Western, and 103rd due to, street blockage at 103rd Street/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Disrupted
ShortDescription: Service on the Brown Line is disrupted due to mechanical problems. Seek alternatives, such as local buses to other lines; working to provide alts and restore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Brown Line is currently disrupted due to mechanical problems.

At this time, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to provide alternative service and also to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow significant extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 71st/University
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via71st, Dorchester, 73rd, South Chicago, and 71st due to, street blockage at 71st/University.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via71st, Dorchester, 73rd, South Chicago, and 71st due to, street blockage at 71st/University.
